strings.string: No locale is set for this user - system default "%s" used
Unknown locale "%s" set
There are no membership conditions set for "%s". This user is always a member of this group.
Group Membership Conditions for "%1$s" (Id: #%2$s)
This user is not a member of any user groups; it cannot be restricted
When the user closes the browser
When the time since their last Matrix-Activity* is longer than
When the time since their last login is longer than

Matrix-Activity refers to either accessing a page on the frontend, or having the backend interface open. If none of the boxes above are ticked then the session expiry time will be equal to the longest session expiry preference configured in the system, to a maximum of a year and a minimum of a week.
